Class ModuleFactions

    • sledgehammer.util.Printable
      • sledgehammer.plugin.Module
        • sledgehammer.plugin.MongoModule
          • sledgehammer.module.faction.ModuleFactions

  • public class ModuleFactions
extends MongoModule
    Module responsible for managing factions.

      • commandCreateFaction

        public Response commandCreateFaction(Player commander,
                                     java.lang.String factionName,
                                     java.lang.String tag,
                                     java.lang.String password)
        Attempts to create a Faction with given parameters.
        Parameters:
        commander - The Player creating the Faction.
        factionName - The String name of the Faction.
        tag - The String tag of the Faction.
        password - The administrator String password of the Faction.
        Returns:
        The Response result.

      • commandDisbandFaction

        Parameters:
        commander - The Player attempting to disband the Faction
        Returns:
        The Response result.

        public Response commandInviteToFaction(Player commander,
                                       java.lang.String usernameInvited)
        Parameters:
        commander - The Player that owns the Faction.
        usernameInvited - The user-name of the Player to invite to the Faction.
        Returns:
        Returns a Response that details the result of the action.

                                    java.lang.String factionName)

        factionName - The name of the Faction inviting the Player.

      • commandRejectInvites

        public Response commandRejectInvites(Player commander,
                                     java.lang.String factionName)
        Rejects and deletes FactionInvite invites for the Player. If null is passed on the Faction argument, then all invites that exist (if any), will be rejects and deleted.
        Parameters:
        commander - The Player being affected.
        factionName - The name of the Faction being specified. If "all" is passed, all FactionInvites will be processed.
        Returns:
        Returns a Response that details the result of the action.

      • commandKickFromFaction

        public Response commandKickFromFaction(Player commander,
                                       java.lang.String usernameKicked,
                                       java.lang.String reason)
        TODO: Implement reasons.
        Parameters:
        commander - The Player owning the Faction.
        usernameKicked - The name of Player being kicked from the Faction.
        reason - (Optional) The reason for being kicked.
        Returns:
        Returns a Response that details the result of the action.

      • commandSetFactionPassword

        public Response commandSetFactionPassword(Player commander,
                                          java.lang.String passwordOriginal,
                                          java.lang.String passwordNew)
        Validates and changes the password for a Faction.
        Parameters:
        commander - The Player. Will return as a failure if not the owner of a Faction.
        passwordOriginal - The original String password to validate the change.
        passwordNew - The new String password to set for the Faction.
        Returns:
        Returns a Response that details the result of the action.

      • commandSetFactionTag

        public Response commandSetFactionTag(Player commander,
                                     java.lang.String tagNew)
        Validates and changes the tag for a Faction.
        Parameters:
        commander - The Player. Will return as a failure if not the owner of a Faction.
        tagNew - The String tag to set for the Faction.
        Returns:
        Returns a Response that details the result of the action.

      • commandSetFactionName

        public Response commandSetFactionName(Player commander,
                                      java.lang.String nameNew)
        Parameters:
        commander - The Player. Will return as a failure if not the owner of a Faction.
        nameNew - The String name to set for the Faction.
        Returns:
        Returns a Response result. If all validations pass, Result.SUCCESS is passed.

        Returns a Response result. If all validations pass, Result.SUCCESS is passed.

        Parameters:

        Returns:
        Returns a Response that is never null. If the validation is a success, response.getResult() should return Result.SUCCESS.

      • validatePlayerFactionCreate

        public Response validatePlayerFactionCreate(Player player)
        Returns whether or not the Player is valid to create a Faction
        Parameters:
        player - The Player being validated.
        Returns:
        Returns a Response based on the results of the tests. If all tests pass, Result.SUCCESS is passed to the Response.

        Returns:

      • createFaction

        public Faction createFaction(java.lang.String factionName,
                             java.lang.String tag,
                             java.lang.String password,
                             java.util.UUID ownerId)
        Creates a Faction with given parameters, along with a new FactionMember, if one for the owner does not exist.
        Parameters:
        factionName - The String name of the Faction.
        tag - The String tag of the Faction.
        password - The administrator String password of the Faction.
        ownerId - The Unique ID of the Player that is set to as the owner of the Faction.
        Returns:
        The new Faction.

        faction - The Faction being deleted.

        public boolean tagExists(java.lang.String tag)
        Parameters:
        tag - The String tag of the Faction.
        Returns:
        Returns true if a Faction is currently using the provided tag. (The tag is forced upper-case on the check. All Faction tags are upper-case).

        public java.util.List<FactionInvite> getInvitesForPlayer(Player player)

      • getInvitesForPlayer

        public java.util.List<FactionInvite> getInvitesForPlayer(java.util.UUID playerId)
        Parameters:
        playerId - The Unique ID of the Player.
        Returns:
        A LinkedList of FactionInvites for a Player. If the Player has no invites, the list will return empty.

      • getFactionInvite

        public FactionInvite getFactionInvite(Player player,
                                      Faction faction)
        Returns a FactionInvite for a given Player from the given Faction.
        Parameters:
        player - The Player being invited to the Faction.
        faction - The Faction inviting the Player.
        Returns:
        Returns a FactionInvite if a invite exists for the Player from the Faction. Returns null if a invite does not exist.
